name: 21K
description:
In this tiny game, you will control your train, loading all the minerals and finally reaching the destination. Some special minerals will affect the motivation of the train. Therefore you should schedule your route carefully.

This is the game that I had developed it within 48 hours. All the jobs were done by myself. Some elements, for example, apparently, the sprites of the minerals, are  borrowed from other games. 

The author of this game is still a sophomore and is poor at English. In addition, any suggestions are welcomed.

Because there is no localization in this version, I will list all the functions of different kinds of minerals in case you need them:

Iron, Copper, Gold: No extra feature

Diamond: Let your train turn back

Powder: It may hurt your train when the locomotive reach the "upward" of that grid.
